name: Space Defence VR
description:
Your space ship has been infiltrated by enemy robots!

As the ships captain you must use your highly modified laser pistols to defend your space ship and your crew!

Your shield can handle 3 enemy explosions, don't let them reach get though the cargo room.

Controls

Use your guns as controllers, shooting the buttons to interact with them.

Use your right controller trigger to shoot the blue gun, your left controller trigger shoots the red gun.

Shoot the red robots with the red pistol and the blue enemies with the blue pistol.

Requirements

VR Headset

Computer capable of running VR  applications
